# Read Magic (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level:** [[0 Level Adept Spells|Adept 0]], [[0 Level Bard Spells|Bard 0]], [[0 Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 0]], [[0 Level Druid Spells|Druid 0]], [[1st Level Elven Archer Spells|Elven archer 1]], [[1st Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]], [[0 Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 0]], [[0 Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 0]], [[0 Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 0]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, F (a clear crystal or mineral prism)

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 330

You can decipher magical inscriptions on objects—books, scrolls, weapons, and the like—that would otherwise be unintelligible. This deciphering does not normally invoke the magic contained in the writing, although it may do so in the case of a cursed or trapped scroll. Furthermore, once the spell is cast and you have read the magical inscription, you are thereafter able to read that particular writing without recourse to the use of *read magic.* You can read at the rate of one page (250 words) per minute. The spell allows you to identify a *[[Glyph of Warding (Spell)|glyph of warding]]* with a DC 13 [[Spellcraft (Skill)|Spellcraft]] check, a *[[Glyph of Warding, Greater (Spell)|greater glyph of warding]]* with a DC 16 [[Spellcraft (Skill)|Spellcraft]] check, or any *symbol* spell with a [[Spellcraft (Skill)|Spellcraft]] check (DC 10 + spell level).

*Read magic* can be made permanent with a *[[Permanency (Spell)|permanency]]* spell.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Adept 0 to Level per *PF GameMastery Guide.* 

                       Added Elven archer 1 to Level per New Paths Compendium (Kobold Press), pg. 20.
